verses.text: \w A|strong="H1121"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1121"\w* canticle, \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Core, on \w the|strong="H1121"\w* second day \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* week.

\w Great|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* praised \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* city \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* holy mountain.

\w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* mount Sion founded, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sides \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* north, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* city \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.
\w In|strong="H1696"\w* her houses \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* God \w be|strong="H3816"\w* known, \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* protect her.
\w For|strong="H0834"\w* behold \w the|strong="H0853"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth assembled themselves: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* gathered together.

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* saw, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* wondered, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0430"\w* troubled, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0430"\w* moved:
Trembling took hold \w of|strong="H4428"\w* them. There \w were|strong="H0430"\w* pains \w as|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H4428"\w* woman \w in|strong="H0430"\w* labour.
\w With|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* vehement wind thou shalt break \w in|strong="H0430"\w* pieces \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ships \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Tharsis.

\w As|strong="H3427"\w* we \w have|strong="H1471"\w* heard, \w so|strong="H3427"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* we seen, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* city \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H0430"\w* hosts, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* city \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath founded \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ever.

\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w received|strong="H0622"\w* thy mercy, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy temple.
According to thy name, O God, so also is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of justice.
Let mount Sion rejoice, and the daughters of Juda be glad; because of thy judgments, O Lord.
Surround Sion, and encompass her: tell ye in her towers.
Set your hearts on her strength; and distribute her houses, that ye may relate it in another generation.
For this is God, our God unto eternity, and for ever and ever: he shall rule us for evermore.
